src_original: dharmadāyakena bhavitavyaṃ dharmadānapatinā /  yaś ca śāriputra gṛhī bodhisatvo gaṅgānadīvālikāsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇi saptaratnapratipūrṇāni kṛtvā tathāgatebhyo 'rhadbhyaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyād /
yaś ca śāriputra pravrajyāparyāpanno bodhisatvâikāṃ catuṣpadikāṃ-
yasya khalu punaḥ śāriputra pātrâgataḥ pātraparyāpanno lābho bhaved dhārmiko dharmalabdhaḥ /
sacet punaḥ kaścid evâgatya pātraṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā yāceta /
sacet punas tasyônaṃ cīvaraṃ bhaved yan niśritya brahmaca-  [ Bendall ed p145 ---> ]
